interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vitamasques Multivitamin Sleeping Mask Made with Essential Vitamins & Multi-Molecular Hyaluronic Acid for Healthy, Nourished & Hydrated Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Review Date: 2022/09/14
Store: Vitamasques
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Hyaluronic Acid', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 2.36 x 1.57 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258970081'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:890fbc174078c15263a7f9bc618c3905]] I've tried several things from this brand and so far this one is my favorite.  I'm surprised because I didn't expect to like it but I really enjoy it.  I've been using it after Thierry night cream.  It is really wet when you put it on. The little colored balls rub into your skin when you're applying.  It dries down and soaks into my skin so fast.  Plus it smells really good.  I love that it's a sleeping mask and you don't have to wash it off. I've got dry skin and the night cream alone wasn't enough moisture for me but adding this on top is so much better.
Review Title: Love this
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

This thing does exactly what it says. Its actually made me kind of lazy cleaning my brushes because it does such a great job getting all the makeup off. The little silicone brush thingy is pretty useful.  It definitely helps me get my brushes clean faster.
It works
Salux Nylon Japanese Beauty Skin Bath Wash Cloth/Towel - White2PACK
SALUX
['Beauty Skin Cloth is great for your skin. Use less soap and create more later This wash cloth is designed to stimulate your skin and help blood circulate leaving your skin feeling refreshed and smooth. It is excellent for massage.']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '34.65 x 34.65 x 0.04 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AW00312PCK', 'UPC': '614409722533'}
These are amazing!  Even my husband loves them and I can never get him to exfoliate. It feels so great to wash with this.  If you like body scrubs i highly recommend try this because it is so much better.
Exfoliate everywhere!
essence | Welcome to London Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Matte & Metallic Blendable Shades | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Free From Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles
essence cosmetics
{'Brand': 'Essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 0.46 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934871', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosnova'}
This is my first time using essence eyeshadow and it will definitely not be my last. I never really use drug store eyeshadow and to be honest I don't think I have any in my collection.  But if this is the quality I can expect then that is about to change. I'm so impressed with the performance of these shadows! Most of the shades are buttery smooth and pigmented.  The mattes blend out so easily and I didn't get any patchiness. You do have to build these up but that is not necessarily a bad thing. There was quite a bit of kick up in the pan but I didn't get any fallout at all.  This color story is beautiful and even if you aren't a fan of colorful eyeshadow there's still lots to work with. I am very much looking forward to trying more palettes from this brand.
I'm impressed!
seedling Heated Eye Mask for Dry Eyes, Eye Compress Moist Heat, Silk sleep mask for dry eye relief, Plant Extract Warm Compress for Eyes, Stye Eye Therapy Mask (Blue)
Seedling
{'Brand': 'Seedling', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 4.2 x 0.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'M', 'Manufacturer': 'seedling', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
[[VIDEOID:36d4410bf57b9b8fc73b6e62a0e7688b]] I've been dealing with dry eyes for a couple years now and I wear contacts so it can get pretty uncomfortable.  When I saw that these masks can help with dry eyes I had to give it a try. This has quickly become my favorite part of my nighttime routine.  It is so relaxing I think I could sleep with it on. I do wish it got a bit hotter but I guess they don't want you to burn your eyes.
Love this!
Baboo Kids Bamboo Toothbrush Soft Bristles - BPA Free Activated Charcoal - Organic Wooden Baby Tooth Brush - Eco-Friendly Biodegradable Toothbrushes for Toddlers, Child and Babies
BABOO
{'Brand': 'BABOO', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Special Feature': 'Charcoal Infused Bristle', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Ultra Soft', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 0.44 x 0.44 inches; 0.42 Ounces', 'UPC': '869003000444', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Manufacturer': 'Baboo'}
This is the cutest little toothbrush.  It's a little less than 6" long.  It's the perfect size for small hands. The bristles are super soft so it won't be too rough on the kiddos. I like that they're black, I've never seen that before. The bamboo feels smooth and I'm not seeing any splintering so far.
Perfect for little hands
Vitamasques Multivitamin Sleeping Mask Made with Essential Vitamins & Multi-Molecular Hyaluronic Acid for Healthy, Nourished & Hydrated Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Vitamasques

I've been using it after Thierry night cream.  It is really wet when you put it on. The little colored balls rub into your skin when you're applying.  It dries down and soaks into my skin so fast.  Plus it smells really good.  I love that it's a sleeping mask and you don't have to wash it off. I've got dry skin and the night cream alone wasn't enough moisture for me but adding this on top is so much better.
Love this
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to prioritize efficiency and ease in their beauty and skincare routines, now incorporating advanced skincare items that enhance hydration and nourishment. Their recent purchase reflects an ongoing interest in vegan and cruelty-free products, showcasing a commitment to ethical choices that cater to both personal care and environmental consciousness.

- **Performance Appreciation**: The user values high-performing products that deliver significant results. Their positive experience with a new sleeping mask highlights their appreciation for innovative items that offer intense moisture, demonstrating a need for effective solutions that align with their values of comfort and sustainability.

- **Practicality**: The user's focus on practical, multifunctional solutions remains evident. Their choice to layer products for improved hydration illustrates a commitment to simplifying their daily regimen while ensuring comprehensive care, reinforcing their preference for products that seamlessly integrate into their lifestyle.

- **Simplicity**: Their inclination towards straightforward and effective items persists, now extending to products that tackle specific skin concerns. This supports their holistic approach to beauty and well-being, ensuring ease in usage without compromising on results.

- **Holistic Approach**: The user's ongoing focus on overall health drives their thoughtful selection of skincare products that not only enhance their beauty routine but also promote well-being. Their choices reflect a commitment to both personal and environmental health, demonstrating a desire for sustainable, nourishing solutions.

Overall, the user's profile showcases a dedication to effective, innovative skincare solutions that enhance both comfort and sustainability for themselves.
